_sText:
This is a map based of the show Bleach. This is the gun version of the map so u can buy every weapon no longer there is model sword at spawn but still fun u have 200 gravity default and i hope u all enjoy it people on my server love it.AND NOW ITS XMAS i made just it look a lil more Christmas like just for the season thought it would be fun hope u like it

-------Added--------
+ Added more Christmas LIGHTS!! and trees made

+Christmas Lights and snow and lots of thing\'s to make it feel more like the season just to have fun with it and stuff hope u like it

+More realistic buildings from the show that are actually there

+ 3D skybox

+ADDED BOMB ZONES there are 2 bomb zones now one on top of the tower and one on top of the place ct\'s spawn at

+Also added 2 more battle zones from the show the front park added blood and stuff were ichigo fought renji and also added in the back were Yoruichi and Cpt. Soi Fong fought at Forest like area with tree\'s

-------FIXED---------
FIXED the base of the round park made it alot more correctly it's completely differnt 

FIXED the leaks no more leaks at all

FIXED The shadowing is not a lot better it doesn\'t have random black blotches at all

Fixed The crash problem when u look straight up no longer crashes at all so don\'t have to worrie about that

Fixed Also fixed the problem with the one sword that if u were to walk into it, it would also crash the server
-------CREDITS--------
Devi8 for the bridge prefab he made link is http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabcats/53?prefabs_page=2

mrkit4423 For his awsome christmas tree models that are in the map and they were nicely done i do say so myself here is link http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/2642
